document_data.name: Nabraether
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nabraether''' was an author in or before the mid-8{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|A 'play,' Baerast? And 'of sorts'? Not an obscure spellbook or one of Nabraether's meaty grimoires?|The sage Beldroon, c. 761}}
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|767}}, when curious about the reading habits of his fellow sage [[Tabarast]], [[Beldroon]] asked him if he was really reading a play, or instead one of Nabraether's meaty grimoires.
